source_objects.description: Master Project Management with courses on: PMI RMP, PRINCE Foundation certification, software project management, CBAP, project planning and execution.
source_objects.title: Project Management

items.title: Planning Quality Management (PMI - PMP)
items.headline: Project Management Professional Certification Program (PMI-PMP)
objectives_summary: Recognize aspects of managing project quality
Match quality management concepts with examples
Recognize the relationship between the three Project Quality Management processes

visible_instructors.name: Tom and Angela

items.headline: How to Effectively Communicate with Stakeholders to Discover User Stories, Features, and Non-functional Requirements
objectives_summary: Define and distinguish five specific requirements elicitation approaches from one-on-one Requirements Interviews to Requirements Gathering Workshops
Evaluate the pros and cons of each approach for your organization and project
Prepare, perform, and manage effective requirements gathering interviews and workshops

items.title: RCA: Root cause analysis
items.headline: Giving you a step by step guide and extensive toolkit on how to conduct effective RCAs within an organisation.
objectives_summary: Root cause analysis
How to effectively deliver an RCA within an organisation
Root cause analysis tools to use

items.title: Business Analysis: Become a Business Analyst
items.headline: Learn the role of Business Analysis and the Business Analyst in the business change lifecycle
objectives_summary: Know the fundamentals of Business Analysis
Know the responsibilities of a Business Analyst
Identify the stages of the Business Change Lifecycle

items.title: Business Process Mapping. Beginner's Guide.
items.headline: Learn to create business maps and flowcharts to identify problems and improve your business
objectives_summary: Students will be able to create their own business maps and flowcharts
Students will be able to structure their business processes
Students will get acquainted with Unified Modelling Language, its components and symbols

items.headline: How to break the curse of Procrastination! Start now to break the cycle!
objectives_summary: Discover the source of their procrastination
Practise skills to beat procrastination
Take action on their procrastination

items.title: Introduction to Translation Project Management

objectives_summary: They will be giving an introduction to how to project manage a translation project.

Creating professional dashboards in Smartsheet
Proofing in Smartsheet

items.title: Complete Agile Project Management & Delivery in Just 1 Hour

visible_instructors.title: Afridi Biswas
visible_instructors.job_title: 9 Year Of Experience Over Digital IT Projects & Expertise
visible_instructors.name: Afridi

items.headline: Master Agile principles and Learn about the key the most important concepts and tools of Project Management Easily
objectives_summary: You will learn the key concepts of Agile Development, Agile Project Delivery and Agile Project Management.
You will understand the differences between Agile and traditional project delivery (other methodologies).
You will learn to launch products faster.

items.title: Building a Successful Agile Programme in Financial Services
items.headline: Agile Capital Consulting - experts in agile success (Michael Cheung & Edmund Lawrence)
objectives_summary: Understand how to implement Agile methodology in a regulated environment, like the bank.

items.title: Step by Step Setting up a project in ProjectLibre

visible_instructors.title: Pieter Rademeyer, PMP, Pr.Eng, Pr.CPM
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Project Manager and Civil Engineer
visible_instructors.name: Pieter

items.headline: Setting up a professional project schedule or project plan by using ProjectLibre (version 1.9.2 or 1.9.1) for Windows
objectives_summary: This course will teach you to interpret and prepare a professional project schedule in ProjectLibre (version 1.9.2 or version 1.9.1) for Windows, and you will understand (1) the different task types, (2) effort driven scheduling, (3) total float and free float, (4) constraints and deadline dates, (5) task dependencies, and leads and lags, and (6) to identify overallocated resources.

items.title: PMI-ACP Certification: Managing Stakeholder Engagement
items.headline: Agile Certified Practitioner Certification Program - Course 7 of 8 - Managing Stakeholder Engagement
objectives_summary: Classify members of a project community according to stakeholder types and
Recognize the actions that engage stakeholders throughout the stages of an agile project
Describe the concept of decision framing and use a decision gradient to lead a group in making a decision

items.title: Planning Risk Management  (PMBOK6 Aligned)
items.headline: The Risk Management Certification Program (PMI-RMP) - (PMBOK6 Aligned)
objectives_summary: Define what is meant by project risk
Be able to recognize examples of project risk
Identify the three risk factors needed to reduce uncertainty

items.headline: Project Management Basics:PMP,PMBOK(Project charter,PMO,Stakeholder,Project Sponsor,Project life cycle,Prototype ).

items.headline: Get a good grounding in Project Management, to successfully manage your Projects.
objectives_summary: Describe a project's context, project success criteria, benefits and its relationship with project management.
Carry out a stakeholder analysis and describe ways in which they can be managed.
Describe ways in which projects can be monitored and controlled.
